body_html: @carltonwang I don't understand the issue. Is this a bug, a feature request, or a suggestion that we change the interfaces? What do you mean by the default type? The docs suggest that tf.matrix_band_part accepts either int32 or int64 for num_lower and num_upper.
body_text: @carltonwang I don't understand the issue. Is this a bug, a feature request, or a suggestion that we change the interfaces? What do you mean by the default type? The docs suggest that tf.matrix_band_part accepts either int32 or int64 for num_lower and num_upper.
body: @carltonwang I don't understand the issue. Is this a bug, a feature request, or a suggestion that we change the interfaces? What do you mean by the default type? The docs suggest that tf.matrix_band_part accepts either int32 or int64 for num_lower and num_upper.
